question: Which of the following is not correct with respect to Neolithic age?
option1: The people of Neolithic age used tools of polished stone
option2: The people of Neolithic age knew fishing
option3: Neolithic people cultivated wheat and barley
explanation:
About Neolithic age:
  • Neolithic settlements in the Indian subcontinent are not older than 6000 BC.
  • The people of Neolithic age used tools of polished stone.
  • The people of Neolithic age knew fishing.
  • Neolithic people cultivated wheat and barley.
  • They domesticated cattle, sheep and goats.
